name: Uttara Motors Ltd (UML) CRM System
description: Developed responsive user interfaces with React.js for admin and agent panels. Integrated backend APIs, implemented real-time data handling, and used SWR, Tailwind CSS, and GitHub for smooth, collaborative development.

name: Career Hub
description: Built Career Hub website with React.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. Incorporated DaisyUI for a user-friendly interface. Simplified job applications, ensuring a seamless user experience and engagement.

name: Book Blend
description: Developed a responsive and user-friendly book review website using React.js, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, HTML, and CSS.

name: Click to Buy
description: Developed using React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. This responsive e-commerce site lets users add products to cart, adjust quantity, and view automatic price updates.

name: Janata WiFi CRUD App
description: Full-stack CRUD web app using React.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Visualizes stock data in a table with editable rows and includes multi-axis charts. Supports switching between JSON and MongoDB models.
